info.title: ShowCastDB CRUD REST API
info.description: A REST API for streamlined management(CRUD) of TV show cast and actor information.

get.summary: Retrieve actor details by unique ID
get.description: Fetches the full profile of a TV show actor, including character and real name, using their unique actor identifier.

put.description: Modifies all details of a specified cast member by their actor ID; input should include the complete actor object.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (UUID) of the actor to update

delete.summary: Remove an actor from the database
delete.description: Deletes a cast member’s record and all associated data using their unique actor ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (UUID) of the actor to delete

patch.description: Updates an actor’s role name for a specific cast member using their actor ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (UUID) of the actor to update

get.summary: List all actors in the database
get.description: Returns a collection of all TV show cast members and their roles currently available in the database.

post.summary: Add a new actor to the database
post.description: Creates a new cast member entry with details including show name, character name, and real name, actorID generated automatically.

ShowActorDTO.description: Details of the actor to create

ActorShowNameUpdateDTO.description: The newActorShowName of the actor to update
